About

With 11 years of leadership experience in healthcare, operations management, and the talent acquisition industry, I have obtained a valuable blend of professional knowledge to contribute to the workplace. I am knowledgeable in labor laws and EEOC and OFCCP compliance while managing a diverse population of professionals at many levels. I enjoy helping other professionals succeed in their career by endorsing the following truth: "Certain skills sets can be transferable across industries, securing the right fit for the right position." As a positive and visionary leader, I influence others to explore innovative solutions to overcome operational and talent asset barriers, resulting in desirable outcomes and a positive team culture.

Download to .pdf

Resume

  • Dietitian Talent Acquisition Manager

    Compass Group USA | April 2017 - July 2020

    • Oversight of the clinical dietitian recruitment team supporting Morrison Healthcare, for over 750 hospitals across the US including corporate clinical leadership
    • Facilitated collaborative partnerships with Compass corporate and sector nutrition leaders to develop attractive tools, social media strategies, and professional networking to enhance candidate experience and expand brand recognition
    • Talent Acquisition project lead for the OutMatch selection assessment implementation across all Compass Group USA sectors, including job mapping of over 700 job titles, competency realignments, and full ATS integration
    • Led and participated in several projects for the Talent Acquisition Team. Streamlined monthly reporting processes to improve team productivity
    • Talent advisor for clinical leadership, bringing awareness to factors affecting candidate pools, labor markets, and offering innovative solutions to overcome barriers

  • Diversity & Inclusion Action Council

    Compass One Healthcare | September 2017 - July 2020

    • Served as the DIAC Communications Lead for the Compass One Healthcare sectors, 2019 and 2020
    • Created the first monthly DIAC newsletters for the organization full of useful diversity and inclusion resources to be shared in all Compass One Healthcare hospitals, led in the communication plans for our Inclusion Ambassador Program, and annual Inclusion Week celebrations
    • Collaboration with the other sector DIAC Communications Leads and Compass Group D&I Leadership Team to develop company D&I resources, videos, website wireframe
    • Highlighted on the Morrison Healthcare blog regarding workplace diversity

  • Dietitian Talent Acquisition Recruiter

    Compass Group USA | September 2016 - April 2017

    • Full cycle healthcare recruiter for multiple regions across the US, supporting the Morrison Healthcare sector
    • Sourcing, interviewing, screening, and presenting potential external and internal candidates to hiring managers, while enhancing the candidate and hiring manager experience
    • Proficient in several HR and financial management software systems. Compliance with EEOC/OFCCP guidelines, and company policies
    • Successfully achieved productivity benchmarks such as time to fill, conversion volume, diversity, and retention
    • Serve as a talent advisor, leading hiring managers and candidates to the right fit for the business and to help candidates achieve their career aspirations
    • Recruitment for clinical leadership for new business system partnerships, such as the Mayo Clinic Health System.

  • Director, Food & Nutrition Services

    Morrison Healthcare | March 2015 - September 2016
    Vantage Point Hospital/Piney Ridge Treatment Center - Fayetteville, AR

    • Newly acquired 1.7 million managed volume business. Full kitchen renovations for both facilities without disruption to service or compliance
    • Spearheaded 2016 Compass in the Community outreach event, organizing to include key leaders from 8 other sector accounts in the NW Arkansas Compass network, event featured in Compass One Healthcare company newsletter
    • Improved account PBO trend by 56K, and a 22% increase in patient satisfaction YOY. 100% survey readiness compliance and performance as outlined by federal, state, and company standards

  • Senior Director, Food & Nutrition Services

    Morrison Healthcare | April 2012 - March 2015
    Sparks Regional Medical Center - Summit Medical Center - CHS Regional Service Center - Fort Smith, AR

    • 5.6 million managed volume foodservice operation comprised of 96 hourly associates and 11 salaried managers
    • Created an innovative Outpatient Nutrition Business Model used to support various pilots within Morrison Healthcare
    • Revised employee work flow schedules and kitchen work flow to improve patient meal service times by 50%. 100% survey readiness compliance and performance as outlined by federal, state, and company standards

  • Director, Food & Nutrition Services

    Morrison Healthcare | January 2011 - April 2012
    Northwest Medical Center - Bentonville, AR

    • Led Foodservice operations and clinical team comprised of 32 hourly associates and 4 salaried managers
    • Implemented operational efficiencies with a projected saving of $211K from PY
    • Developed and implemented comprehensive nutrition and culinary marketing strategies to increase cafeteria sales by 24%. 100% survey readiness compliance and performance as outlined by federal, state, and company standards

  • Interim Director, Food & Nutrition Services

    Morrison Healthcare | September 2010 - January 2011
    Northwest Medical Center - Springdale, AR

  • Director, Nutrition Services

    Health Management Associates | July 2009 - September 2010
    Summit Medical Center - Van Buren, AR

  • Home Economist

    Arkansas Department of Health | June 2007 - August 2008
    WIC Program - Springdale, AR

  • University of Arkansas Dietetics Advisory Board

    Member 2012 - Present

    Member 2008 - Present

Contact

Connect with me on email, LinkedIn, or drop me a note in the contact form below. I'd love to hear from you and see how we can work together!
